text: (napiye! Porulkalil) ‘‘etaic celavu ceyvatu? (Yarukkuk kotuppatu?)'' Enru um'mitam ketkinranar. (Atarku) nir kuruviraka: (Nanmaiyaik karuti) ‘‘ninkal ettakaiya porulaic celavu ceytapotilum (atait) tay, tantai, currattar, anataikal, elaikal, valippokkarkal akiyorukkuk kotunkal. Innum, ninkal (veru) enna nanmaiyaic ceytapotilum ataiyum niccayamaka allah ari(ntu atarkuriya kuliyum taru)van
